>Construction of q1product
Acquire oligo q1oligo1
Acquire oligo q1oligo2
Acquire plasmid pTargetF
Acquire plasmid p20N5
PCR q1oligo1,q1oligo2 on p20N5 (1672 bp, pcrpdt)
Digest pcrpdt with XhoI,BamHI (pcrdig)
Digest pTargetF with BamHI,XhoI (vectdig)
Ligate pcrdig,vectdig (q1product)

>q1oligo1
ccaaaCTCGAGatgagtattcaacatttccg
>q1oligo2
gctagGGATCCgtaaaaaggccgcgttgctggcg
>p20N5

>pTargetF
